ErpOrderIssued.pharmacyName: 重庆市吉和药品有限公司
ErpOrderIssued.orderDetailSqlContext: insert into h2.T_ORDER_DETAIL (ORDER_CODE, ORDER_DETAIL_ID, SPU_CODE, product_num, PRICE, PRODUCT_NORMAL_PRICE,is_coupon,ID) values ( 订单编号, 子订单明细ID,商品编码, 商品数量, 实付单价, 实付单价,是否特价,h2.YHYC_ORDER_DETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
ErpOrderIssued.orderSqlContext: insert into h2.T_ORDER (ORDER_CODE, ENTERPRISE_CODE, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_AMOUNT, SHOP_COUPON, PLATFORM_COUPON, PREFERENTIAL_MONEY, FREIGHT, USE_REBATE_MONEY, ORDER_TOTAL, PAY_TYPE, ORDER_STATUS, REMARK,ID) values (订单编号, 客户ID, to_date(substr(订单时间,0,19),'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), 订单金额, 0, 平台优惠券金额, 0, 订单运费, 返利金, 订单金额, 订单类型, 0, 备注,h2.YHYC_ORDER_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
ErpOrderIssued.orderSqlContextRepeat: select count(0) from h2.t_order where order_code = 订单编号
